name: TITAN 3D: MAP PACK #1
description:
5 level map pack based on Titan - 3D | NOTE: Does not require Titan 3D to play!!!

This map-pack features 5 new levels and is difficult and challenging! It is recommended you play this AFTER beating the original Titan-3D 

new features include:

+2 Modified weapons and new blood drenched weapon sprites

+new enemies

+5 new levels

+new sprites/textures
